short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Source and save statistics to add credibility to your content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Source by PrimoStats makes it easier for content marketers to save and organize statistics. Source the stats you need from your Google Chrome™ browser. With one click, save your stats in Google Sheets™.

This extension includes fields to save the statistic, source URL, publication title, and publication year. You also can add notes for each stat.

No more forgetting where you saw a stat. Source the stats you need in real-time. That way, you save time and create better content.

Key Benefits
- Quickly source stats as you research online
- Curate stats with notes to read later
- Save and organize your stats in Google Sheets™

How It Works
- Install ‘Source by PrimoStats’ to your Google Chrome™ browser
- Select ‘Settings’ in the extension
- Connect your Google account
- Add your desired Google Sheet URL
- Select ‘My Source’
- Enter information in the form fields (Source URL is required)
- Click ‘Source Stat’ to add your stat to the Google sheet

Requirement
You need a Solo, Professional, or Business membership to use Source by PrimoStats. Sign up at PrimoStats.com.

Questions?
Please contact us with your questions and feedback at joseph@primostats.com.

About PrimoStats
PrimoStats helps content marketers find stats faster. We’re a searchable database of curated marketing statistics. Save time researching with stats from reputable sources.
